section.p: This class contains information concerning the injection of anesthesia into the epidural space of the spine.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] method with data type Code
Categorizes the method of administration of the anesthetic agent. Suggested values include: Bolus; Intermittent, Drip infusion, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDose with data type Physical Quantity Interval
Contains the volume (typically in milliliters) of the test dose fluid vehicle.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDoseId with data type Id
Identifies the drug used for the epidural test dose.

Contains exactly one [1..1] method with data type Code
Categorizes the method of administration of the anesthetic agent. Suggested values include: Bolus; Intermittent, Drip infusion, etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDose with data type Physical Quantity Interval
Contains the volume (typically in milliliters) of the test dose fluid vehicle.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDoseId with data type Id
Identifies the drug used for the epidural test dose.
